# s3 - Efficient Yet Effective Search Agent Training via RL ***You Don't Need That Much Data to Train a Search Agent***

**Performance Overview:** ## What is s3?
**s3 Framework**
`s3` is a simple yet powerful framework for training search agents in retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). It teaches language models how to search more effectively—without changing the generator itself. By focusing solely on the search component, `s3` achieves strong performance across QA tasks with just a fraction of the data used by prior methods. It's modular, efficient, and designed to work seamlessly with any black-box LLM. ## Table of Contents - [📦 Installation](#-installation) - [💡 Preparation](#-preparation) - [🏋️ Run Training](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#%EF%B8%8F-run-training) - [🔍 Run Search/Retrieval](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#-run-searchretrieval) - [📈 Run Evaluation](#-run-evaluation) ## 📦 Installation **Searcher & Generator Environment**

🌐 Sprache
Englisch | 简体中文 | 繁體中文 | 日本語 | 한국어 | हिन्दी | ไทย | Französisch | Deutsch | Spanisch | Itapano | Russisch | Portugiesisch | Niederländisch | Polnisch | العربية | فارسی | Türkisch | Vietnamesisch | Indonesisch
# s3 - Effizientes und dennoch effektives Training von Suchagenten mittels RL ***Sie benötigen nicht so viele Daten, um einen Suchagenten zu trainieren***

**Leistungsübersicht:** ## Was ist s3?
**s3-Framework**
`s3` ist ein einfaches, aber leistungsstarkes Framework zum Trainieren von Suchagenten für Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Es bringt Sprachmodellen bei, effizienter zu suchen – ohne den Generator selbst zu verändern. Durch die ausschließliche Fokussierung auf die Suchkomponente erzielt `s3` starke Leistungen bei QA-Aufgaben und benötigt dabei nur einen Bruchteil der Daten im Vergleich zu bisherigen Methoden. Es ist modular, effizient und so konzipiert, dass es nahtlos mit jedem Black-Box-LLM funktioniert. ## Inhaltsverzeichnis - [📦 Installation](#-installation) - [💡 Vorbereitung](#-preparation) - [🏋️ Training starten](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#%EF%B8%8F-run-training) - [🔍 Suche/Abruf ausführen](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#-run-searchretrieval) - [📈 Auswertung durchführen](#-run-evaluation) ## 📦 Installation **Searcher & Generator Umgebung**

Content:
```bash
conda create -n s3 python=3.9
# install torch [or you can skip this step and let vllm to install the correct version for you]
pip install torch==2.4.0 --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121
# install vllm
pip3 install vllm==0.6.3 # or you can install 0.5.4, 0.4.2 and 0.3.1
pip3 install ray

# verl
cd code
pip install -e .

# flash attention 2
pip3 install flash-attn --no-build-isolation

# we use pyserini for efficient retrieval and evaluation
pip install pyserini    # the version we used is 0.22.1

# quality of life
pip install wandb IPython matplotlib huggingface_hub
```
Translation:
```bash
conda create -n s3 python=3.9
# install torch [or you can skip this step and let vllm to install the correct version for you]
pip install torch==2.4.0 --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121
# install vllm
pip3 install vllm==0.6.3 # or you can install 0.5.4, 0.4.2 and 0.3.1
pip3 install ray

# verl
cd code
pip install -e .

# flash attention 2
pip3 install flash-attn --no-build-isolation

# we use pyserini for efficient retrieval and evaluation
pip install pyserini    # the version we used is 0.22.1

# quality of life
pip install wandb IPython matplotlib huggingface_hub
```

Content: **Retriever Environment**
Translation: **Retriever-Umgebung**

Content:
```bash
conda create -n ret python=3.10
conda activate ret

conda install pytorch==2.4.0 torchvision==0.19.0 torchaudio==2.4.0 pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia
pip install transformers datasets pyserini
conda install -c pytorch -c nvidia faiss-gpu=1.8.0
pip install uvicorn fastapi
```
Translation:
```bash
conda create -n ret python=3.10
conda activate ret

conda install pytorch==2.4.0 torchvision==0.19.0 torchaudio==2.4.0 pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia
pip install transformers datasets pyserini
conda install -c pytorch -c nvidia faiss-gpu=1.8.0
pip install uvicorn fastapi
```

## 💡 Preparation
***Download Index & Corpus***

## 💡 Vorbereitung
***Index & Korpus herunterladen***

Content:
```bash
python scripts/download.py --save_path $save_path
cat $save_path/part_* > $save_path/e5_Flat.index
gzip -d $save_path/wiki-18.jsonl.gz
```
Translation:
```bash

cat $save_path/part_* > $save_path/e5_Flat.index
gzip -d $save_path/wiki-18.jsonl.gz
```

Content: ***Precompute Naïve RAG Initialization***
Translation: ***Vorberechnung der naiven RAG-Initialisierung***

Content:
```bash
# deploy retriever
bash scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch.sh # or scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch_mirage.sh for MedCorp corpus.
# deploy generator
bash generator_llms/host.sh # modify tensor-parallel-size to the number of GPUs you use
# run precompute
bash scripts/precompute.sh # this step will take a while, as it will precompute the naïve RAG Cache for training
```
Translation:

```bash
bash scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch.sh # or scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch_mirage.sh for MedCorp corpus.
# deploy generator
bash generator_llms/host.sh # modify tensor-parallel-size to the number of GPUs you use
# run precompute
bash scripts/precompute.sh # this step will take a while, as it will precompute the naïve RAG Cache for training
```
